command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user mJX9EQK12biUJGd.0c3e5cf8c922 --database XQsH52MNZAyXrU9qYq4MDw --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE ridingRecords;
stdout:
Table	Create Table
ridingRecords	CREATE TABLE `ridingRecords` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `recordId` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `date` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `duration` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `distance` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `avgSpeed` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `maxSpeed` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `startTime` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `endTime` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `gpsPointsJson` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `scooterId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `ridingRecords_recordId_unique` (`recordId`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=330001
